channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- TRIRIGA Application Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- TRIRIGA Application Platform

item.title: CVE-2022-43914|2024-08-03T13:40:06.721Z -- ibm -- tririga%20application%20platform
item.description: IBM TRIRIGA Application Platform 4.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 241036.
